mainlight.description: Name of the Main light parameters defined in the Lua scene parameters.

sublight.description: Name of the Sub light parameters defined in the Lua scene parameters.

ambient.description: Name of the Ambient light parameters defined in the Lua scene parameters.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.

Extra.name: A volume that creates animated light.
